dmca.title: [EV1-C1349234J] Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Friday, October 13, 2006 10:29 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1349234J] Copyright Infringement Subject: [EV1-C1349234J] Copyright Infringement ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Copyright Infringement Added by system at Friday, Oct 13 2006 02:30 pm X-MailFrom: eddie@heritagewebdesign.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.110] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri Oct 13 15:28:14 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 13 Oct 2006 15:24:38 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Fri, 13 Oct 2006 15:24:38 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from eddie@heritagewebdesign.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GYTaA-0001Ap-BA for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 13 Oct 2006 15:24:38 -0500 Received: from cp19.heritagewebdesign.com ([64.38.29.50]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from eddie@heritagewebdesign.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GYTa5-000ON1-Lx for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 13 Oct 2006 15:24:34 -0500 Received: from [158.91.201.30] (helo=eddie2mrxiuv4d) by cp19.heritagewebdesign.com with esmtpa (Exim 4.52) id 1GYTa1-0004du-38; Fri, 13 Oct 2006 15:24:29 -0500 From: "eddie dockery" To: Cc: "'Leah Young'" , Subject: Copyright Infringement Date: Fri, 13 Oct 2006 14:26:50 -0600 Message-ID: <000001c6ef05$eae06fd0$ae0da8c0@eddie2mrxiuv4d> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0001_01C6EED3.A04870D0" X-Priority: 3 (Normal) X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook, Build 10.0.2616 Importance: Normal X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2962 X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - cp19.heritagewebdesign.com X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - heritagewebdesign.com X-Source: X-Source-Args: X-Source-Dir: Received-SPF: unknown (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: error in processing during lookup of domain of heritagewebdesign.com: Invalid character found) client-ip=64.38.29.50; envelope-from=eddie@heritagewebdesign.com; helo=cp19.heritagewebdesign.com; problem=Invalid character found near "adamant" in "adamant.fastservers.net"; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 13 Oct 2006 20:24:38.0252 (UTC) FILETIME=[9B177AC0:01C6EF05] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Abuse Department, We have discovered that a website (e-saint.org) that is hosted on your servers appears to have copied our landing site heritagewebdesign.com/web changed the company name and phone number and published it as their own. They even left the title Heritage Web Solutions in the head tag and It also states below the html tag . Please remove this site immediately and we would like the owner information of this site. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. Please respond to this email so that I know you have received it. Thank you, Eddie Dockery Vice President of Development Heritage Web Solutions 1460 Moonriver Dr. Provo Ut. 84604 Tel: 1-866-211-0734 ext.1631 Email: eddie@heritagewebdesign.com MIME element (text/html)

Abuse Department,

 

We have discovered that a website (e-saint.org) that is hosted on your servers appears to have copied our landing site heritagewebdesign.com/web changed the company name and phone number and published it as their own. They even left the title Heritage Web Solutions in the head tag and It also states below the html tag <!-- Mirrored from www.heritagewebdesign.com/web/index.html by HTTrack Website Copier/3.x [XR&CO'2006], Thu, 05 Oct 2006 17:47:21 GMT -->. Please remove this site immediately and we would like the owner information of this site.

 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

 

Please respond to this email so that I know you have received it.

 

Thank you,

Eddie Dockery
Vice President of Development

Heritage Web Solutions
1460 Moonriver Dr.
Provo Ut. 84604

 

Tel: 1-866-211-0734 ext.1631

Email: eddie@heritagewebdesign.com

 

 

MIME element (text/plain)
